name: Maverick
description: PLEASE ADD THE CODE IN USERCHROME.CSS AND USE IT WITH THE DEFAULT FIREFOX THEME! For all the Firefox users who would like to properly enjoy my Maverick 10 - Windows 10 Theme, I've created this matching style. INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS: - go to your profile folder. More info here: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Profile_folder - then go to the "chrome" folder there, creating it if necessary - in the chrome folder copy the userChrome.css file included here - switch to the Default Firefox theme and then restart Firefox! Enjoy!
